about_course:
An Autonomous Institute Noida Institute of Engineering & Technology offers the PG Course M. Tech (CSE) for students with a B. Tech degree in Computer Science and Engineering /Computer Science/ Information Technology and related branches. As a leading M.Tech in Computer Science colleges, the course is offered by the Department of Computer Science & Engineering by highly qualified and experienced faculty members. The intake of this course is 24. The course offers core courses such as Advanced Data Structures and Algorithms, Artificial Intelligence, Research Process and Methodology, High Performance Computing, Robotic Process Automation with seminar, pre-dissertation and dissertation.

Among the top MTech colleges in Greater Noida, the curriculum is based on the needs of the industry. However, at our institution, we provide additional resources to bridge the gap between the academia and the industry. The objectives of this program are to build a technological base in computer science and engineering technologies, to analyze, design, develop and evaluate high-end computer systems, as well as to carry out challenging projects and carry out research activities. It also leads to identifying new trends and evaluating new technologies and working with faculty in different research fields on specialized and specific domains.
fee_structure:
Fee M.Tech
Tuition Fee 81,500
External Exam Fee 10000
Internal Exam Fee 4,000
Security (Refundable)(One Time) 5,000
Registration Fee Including (Lms/E-Content)(One Time) 4,400
Student Welfare (One Time) 5,000
Usage Charges 18850
Other Fee 1,750
Total First Year Fee 130,500
From Next Year Onwards 116,100
#University Pre- Registration has to be paid/done by Student
training_workshop:
Training & workshops

Training and workshops bridge the gap between theory and practice. These activities help students acquire key skills, problem-solving abilities, and inventive thinking.
Students participating in them can interact, share ideas, and network with industry experts, while improving their employability.
online_admission:
Apply Online for Admission to M. Tech In (CSE)

You can apply online for admission to M. Tech In (CSE) quite conveniently in a hassle-free way. For more information about the program, you can download the brochure below.

about_course:
A Master of Technology (M.Tech) in Mechanical Engineering is a postgraduate program offering a comprehensive study of advanced mechanical engineering principles and applications. The curriculum typically dedicated towards Industry 4.0, covering fundamental topics like materials science, alongside specialization tracks in areas such as manufacturing engineering, robotics, or renewable energy. Elective courses allow students to tailor their studies to their interests, while a significant research component, including thesis or dissertation work, provides hands-on experience and fosters innovation. Practical training, lab work, seminars, and workshops supplement theoretical learning, cultivating essential soft skills like communication and project management. Graduates emerge well-prepared for careers in industry, research, academia, or entrepreneurship, equipped with a deep understanding of mechanical engineering and practical skills to tackle complex engineering challenges.

Honours Degree Using MOOCs Platform Coursera/Infosys Springboard

about_course:
NIET offers an AICTE approved International Twinning program for the students.

The program is based on institution-to-institution partnerships and peer relationships which help in broadening the scope of the educational program by providing opportunities for enhanced learning and an affordable access to the students aspiring to pursue higher studies with a global exposure

NIET is one of the few institutes in India who are offering this kind of program.

Key Highlights

  • 01Global exposure and experience
  • 02Access to partner university engagement programs
  • 03Government recognized program valid all over the world
  • 04Opportunities for self development and networking
  • 05Affordable education with maximum learning

about_course:
The Department of Computer Science and Engineering at NIET is known for its excellence in computer engineering education with the highest package and 100% placement record. As one of the leading B Tech CSE colleges in Delhi NCR, the department has a strong tradition of producing producing high-quality professionals and a significant presence in the software industry both in India and abroad, department has established itself as a leader in the field. The department is at the forefront of cutting-edge research and the delivery of state-of-the-art education. Department was established in the year 2001, with the capacity of 60 which increased to 360 intake.

The department has the twinning program with International Universities. NIET has a rich tradition of producing top-notch professionals in the field of computer science and engineering. This tradition has solidified the department's standing as a significant player in the software industry like Microsoft, AWS, Capgemini. The department consistently attracts the brightest students and faculty members, fostering an academic community that values innovation and knowledge sharing. The department is renowned for its pioneering research efforts. Faculty members are leaders in advanced computer technologies such as genetic algorithms, machine learning, data mining, computer graphics, software engineering, cloud computing, Security and network programming. This commitment to cutting-edge research ensures that students receive a well-rounded education that is both current and relevant.

Honours Degree Using MOOCs Platform Coursera/Infosys Springboard

Foreign University Collaborations
